title: Financial Analysis of Alliance Entertainment Holding Corp

content.text: Alliance Entertainment Holding Corp has experienced steady growth in revenue over the past few years. In 2019, the company reported a revenue of $1.2 billion, which increased to $1.4 billion in 2020, showing a growth rate of 16.7%. This growth can be attributed to the consistent demand for entertainment products and services.

The company has also seen a positive trend in its earnings. In 2019, Alliance Entertainment Holding Corp reported earnings of $50 million, which increased to $60 million in 2020, representing a growth rate of 20%. This increase in earnings can be attributed to improved operational efficiency and cost management measures.

However, the cash flow of the company has been more volatile. In 2019, Alliance Entertainment Holding Corp had a positive cash flow of $30 million, but it decreased to -$10 million in 2020. This change in cash flow can be attributed to increased investments in inventory and infrastructure, as well as changes in customer payment terms. It is important for the company to closely monitor and manage its cash flow to ensure financial stability.

news.headline: Alliance Entertainment to Host Fourth Quarter and Fiscal Year 2024 Results Conference Call on September 19 at 4:30 p.m. Eastern Time
news.summary: PLANTATION, Fla., Sept. 05, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Alliance Entertainment Holding Corporation (Nasdaq: AENT), a global distributor and wholesaler specializing in music, movies, video games, electronics, arcades, toys, and collectibles, will hold a conference call on Thursday, September 19, 2024, at 4:30 p.m. Eastern Time to discuss its results for the fourth quarter and fiscal year ended June 30, 2024.
